Headline: #75 74th-75th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Grand due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
